top.title: Witkoff to meet Zelensky for latest Ukraine war talks
top.summary: Donald Trump's envoy will meet the Ukrainian president and European leaders in Berlin to discuss the latest peace plan.

top.title: New photos from Epstein estate show Trump, Andrew and Bill Clinton
top.summary: The photos, which do not imply wrongdoing, are part of a trove of images the House Oversight Committee received from Epstein's estate.

top.title: Thailand-Cambodia fighting continues after Trump says countries agree to ceasefire
top.summary: Thai PM says he told US president a ceasefire is only possible after Cambodia had withdrawn all its forces.

top.title: US TikTok investors in limbo as deal set to be delayed again
top.summary: A deal to sell TikTok has remained elusive, despite earlier claims that a deal was done.

top.title: Amazon pulls AI recap from Fallout TV show after it made several mistakes
top.summary: The errors included getting dialogue wrong and incorrectly claiming a scene was set 100 years earlier than it was.

top.title: Online gaming escaped Australia's social media ban - but critics say it's just as addictive
top.summary: Parents and experts say gaming poses many of the same risks for kids as social media, and want them included.

title.#text: The best instant cameras you can buy right now
Parents call for New York governor to sign landmark AI safety bill
